document.title: Who Controls the Black Phallus? acquiescent Fantasy Sports Culture
document.abstract: The purpose of this presentation is to explore fantasy football participation and whether unconsciously black masculinity is commodified, fetishized, and used for cultural transmission within popular culture. Using Critical Race Theory, I will frame a discussion of race, gender, sexuality, and sport.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
